CustomField.description: This field is populated via a Trigger that finds the Residence and then populates the same Lease that appears in the Most Recent Lease field. This happens on insert of a Listing. Previous Lease is not overwritten if later a different Most Recent Lease is entered on Residence. See D-00012773.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Most Recent Lease that was populated on Residence at the time the Listing was created. This value is not ever overwritten.
CustomField.label: Previous Lease
